title: Birds
description: Students will love learning about their feathered friends, from familiar owls to exotic emus. Each page of text has interesting information and engaging photos.
reviewWords: cockatoos, eagles, emu, hummingbirds, owls, pelican, puffin, roadrunner, toucan, vultures
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast text information
awareness: Segment and Blend Phonemes                : Segment and blend phonemes
